name: Nivea Sun Hydraterende en verkoelende spray
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Citral, Parfum
